captions.text:
- [Blonde Woman] Oo-oo,
look at that dress.
it's two thousand dollars, we're not rich.
- [Woman with black hair] You killin' it.

- [Woman with black hair]
Like, which one of us

is killing it?
- [Blonde Woman] Which one
of us is killin' it, man?
When your best friend moves away

- [Woman with black hair] Liz
doesn't live here anymore.

- [Woman with black
hair] Liz, Nick is here.

- [Liz] No way.
- [Woman with black hair] I got
the job, we're not broke anymore.

- [Woman with black hair]
You killin' it, girl.

- [Liz] You killin' it, girl.
- [Woman with black hair] Girl.

[Both women] One, two,
three, drink, drink, drink.

- [Liz] I just bought this,
what do you think of it?

- [Woman with black hair] I
think you look like a glow stick.

- [Nick] My friends, I
just wanted to interrupt

for two seconds because
basically I have...

- [Woman with black hair] Liz,
oh my god, are you serious?

- [Woman with black hair]
France? France? Wow.

I know, I love you, all right?
- [Liz] I'm so sad.

- [Woman with black hair]
I'm gonna miss you too.
Look, call me every day, okay?

- [Woman with black
hair] Every single day.

- [Woman with black hair]
All of that shit, all of it.
- [Woman with black hair] I love you, bye.
- [Woman with black hair] Oh my god,

- [Woman with black hair]
I think it's super cute.

- [Nick] Doesn't have
to tell you everything.

Oh my god, I was just look at
your pictures, that's crazy.
- [Quinta] Okay, I'm gonna call you back.
I have to go to work.

Yeah, I'll call you
back in a little while.
- [Man] These numbers are great, you guys.
Really proud of what everybody's doin'.
I was talking about this with Quinta.
I love what she's thinkin' on this.
Do you wanna fill everybody in on that?
- [Quinta] Yeah, I do, I think that...

- [Nick] I'll just stick
to my wine for now.
- [Quinta[ Oh my god, I can hear you.

- [Quinta] I can hear
you, okay, yeah, what?

- [ Quinta] Shots, for
sure, I'll pour you one.
and I are just gonna do wine.
It's cute, y'all are french now.

- [Liz] Yeah, it's cute,
do you want some or?

- [Quinta] Nah, I'm good
with my American, yeah.
- [Liz] Wait, let me see your tattoo.

- [Liz] Oh my god, I can't
believe you got that.

- [Quinta] Yeah, I got
it with Jodie from work.

you met her at the party.
- [Liz] Oh, I thought you
- [Quinta] Nah, I just didn't know her
that well but she's really nice.

- [Liz] Ah man, this was fun.
- [Quinta] I know.

- [Quinta] Yeah, wait,
well, I have to work

on Tuesday but we'll figure it out,
- [Liz] Oh.
- [Quinta] Call me when you get home.
- [Quinta] I got yours too, thank you.

Trapped, carress under
mistletoe & forgotten promise

that's made me cry .. Especially when u bff doesn't really move physically

comments.author: BeDOo amar

comments.text:
I have this friend, she's name is Laetisha. We've been friends for 9 years 
now. We live in Indonesia, a year ago she was planning to move to Germany 
and i prayed and prayed that she would not go. A year later, she called me 
... Screaming happily saying that she was moving to Germany for middle 
school, at first I did not believe it was happening. But i'm here watching 
this video having to relate to this so so so much. Next month she's moving, 
and There is a really fucking high chance that she is never ever going back 
to Indonesia for at least a week or two. "She's never coming back, she's 
never coming back", i think every single night. We've just been through so 
so much and it's never going to happen again. Ever.﻿
comments.author: Kinanti Anjani

My best friend is the only person who just got me. She understood me, we 
were amazing together. I miss her. She moved away and we went to different 
schools last year and I came over once in a while but we barely talk and we 
lost that "sparkle" that we used to have. She changed. She's drifting away, 
she has new friends. I'm happy for her, but I really miss her. Lol now I'm 
crying while typing this. I really miss how often we used to hang out. Any 
advice to cope with the situation?﻿

comments.text:
This made me cry so much. In 2nd grade I lost my bestfriend one day. I 
never got to say bye she just disappeared and I walked in her old house 
with her spare key with my parents and everything was gone. There was just 
some notes for the new owner. Now I'm crying because I'll probably never 
see her again. All I have of her is some poilroad photos of us and a 
friendship heart necklace that she has the other half and I don't know if 
she has it. Now I understand why she said goodbye instead of see you 
tomorrow like she always did, I never saw her after that. ﻿

comments.author: Withered Teen

comments.text:
"Both of my friends are moving away, I have thought of suicide in the past, 
and I have failed at it. If they move away my heart will be shattered. I'll 
have no more friends, and no one would be friends with me, I'm just a shy 
weirdo that always just stands in corners and never says a word. I can't 
believe I'm telling everyone this…I guess it's just to make me feel a 
little better? I need advice, should I kill myself? A lot of people at my 
school said I should, I have hung myself before but it ended up with me 
hanging on a rope for about half an hour, I guess my neck isn't able to 
choke? I don't know, death just seams like the easiest option. In fifth 
grade all my friends moved away and I had no other friends until sixth 
grade, it takes me forever to find friends and when there gone…I just feel 
like it's a waste of time having friends….all I have now are the voices in 
my head and my music to keep me company. My family doesn't care about me, 
so why should I care if I die? It's just like sleep, right? I don't know, 
thumbs up on this comment if you think I should kill myself, thumbs down if 
I should keep on living."﻿

I was just crying last night because my best friend and I were texting and 
talking about how much we missed each other. She lives about 10 hours away 
from me, and we're only 15 years old so we're still in school and don't 
have cars, so we can't see each other often. She moved in the summer so we 
haven't seen each other in almost 9 months. It sucks so much not being able 
to see her. It's like everything I see reminds me of her, or the inside 
jokes we have. So this video had me in tears :( ﻿

comments.text:
Lost my best friend to a fight yesterday... I "broke up" our friendship on 
Friday when I was getting tired of being ignored.. I have other friends but 
at the beginning of the year were looking to forward to sharing classes and 
hangout and then one day a puff of smoke hit my face and I realized that 
puff of smoke was out friendship falling apart the dust of what our 
friendship not just ripped apart. I lost her to other people and the sad 
thing I trusted her with a lot of things.. and she just ignored and dust me 
off her shoulder every time I started a conversation with her.. I have 
other close friends but none of them are in my class my social group is 
literally 3 and a plus one (me). That's what I get for a lonely Introvert I 
might just stick with my books for now but this is going to get lonely... 
</3﻿
